issue.message: This declaration is opt-in and its usage should be marked with '@androidx.camera.core.ExperimentalZeroShutterLag' or '@OptIn(markerClass = androidx.camera.core.ExperimentalZeroShutterLag.class)'
This declaration is opt-in and its usage should be marked with '@androidx.camera.core.ExperimentalZeroShutterLag' or '@OptIn(markerClass = androidx.camera.core.ExperimentalZeroShutterLag.class)'
